Summary: TYPE CONSTANT VARIABLE FUNCTION
fgl

fglcdvBluetoothLE

Genero BDL wrapper around the Cordova Bluetooth Low Energy plugin.

TYPE Summary
BgEventArrayT DYNAMIC ARRAY OF BgEventT
BgEventT RECORD <anonymous fglcdvBluetoothLE R1>

Types

BgEventArrayT

TYPE BgEventArrayT DYNAMIC ARRAY OF BgEventT

BgEventT

TYPE BgEventT RECORD <anonymous fglcdvBluetoothLE R1>
    
time DATETIME HOUR TO SECOND
callbackId STRING
result STRING
END RECORD

InitOptionsT

TYPE InitOptionsT RECORD <anonymous fglcdvBluetoothLE R3>
    
request BOOLEAN
statusReceiver BOOLEAN
restoreKey STRING
END RECORD

ScanOptionsT

TYPE ScanOptionsT RECORD <anonymous fglcdvBluetoothLE R5>
    
services DYNAMIC ARRAY OF STRING
allowDuplicates BOOLEAN
scanMode SMALLINT
matchMode SMALLINT
matchNum SMALLINT
callbackType SMALLINT
END RECORD

askForCoarseLocationPermission

FUNCTION askForCoarseLocationPermission() RETURNS BOOLEAN

clearCallbackBuffer

FUNCTION clearCallbackBuffer()

fini

FUNCTION fini()

Finalizes the plugin library

The fini() function should be called when the library is no longer used.

getCallbackData

FUNCTION getCallbackData(bge BgEventArrayT)
Parameters:
bge -

hasCoarseLocationPermission

FUNCTION hasCoarseLocationPermission() RETURNS BOOLEAN

init

FUNCTION init()

Initializes the plugin library

The init() function must be called prior to other calls.

initialize

FUNCTION initialize(initMode SMALLINT, initOptions InitOptionsT) RETURNS INTEGER

Initializes BLE

Parameters:
initMode - INIT_CENTRAL or INIT_PERIPHERAL
initOptions - the initialization options of (see InitOptionsT)
Returns:
0 on success, <0 if error.

isEnabled

FUNCTION isEnabled() RETURNS BOOLEAN

isInitialized

FUNCTION isInitialized() RETURNS BOOLEAN

isScanning

FUNCTION isScanning() RETURNS BOOLEAN

processCallbackEvents

FUNCTION processCallbackEvents()

Processes BluetoothLE Cordova plugin callback events

Returns:
<0 if error. Otherwise, the number of callback data fetched.
